scripts.deploy: npm run build:contract && cd contract && near dev-deploy --wasmFile ./target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/hello_near.wasm
scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:web
scripts.build:contract: cd contract && rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && cargo build --all --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --release
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: npm run build:contract && cd integration-tests && npm test  -- -- "./contract/target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/release/hello_near.wasm"
scripts.deps-install: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../integration-tests && npm install && cd ..
